channel.title: How to fix RSPS Problems with Windows 7
channel.description:
All you have to do is set your environmental variables.
[b]Step 1[/b]
Press the start button > Right click on Computer > Press Properties > Press Advanced System Settings > Press Environmental Variables
[b]Step 2[/b]
If you do not have the latest JDK (v17) download it [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp]HERE[/url]. Press the [b][u]BOTTOM[/u][/b] New.
[b]Path name:[/b] PATH [b]Path value:[/b] C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\
Now test it out!
IF THAT DOESN'T WORK SET IT AS THESE
[b]Path name:[/b] PATH [b]Path value:[/b] C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\

item.title: How to fix RSPS Problems with Windows 7

item.title: How to fix RSPS Problems with Windows 7

@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

All you have to do is set your environmental variables.

Step 1

Press the start button > Right click on Computer > Press Properties > Press Advanced System Settings > Press Environmental Variables

Step 2

If you do not have the latest JDK (v17) download it HERE. Press the BOTTOM New.
